title: On the structure of Witt groups and minimal extension conjecture
summary: Let $\mathcal{E}=\text{Rep}(G)$ be a Tannakian fusion category. For a braided fusion category $\mathcal{C}$ over $\mathcal{E}$ we give sufficient and necessary conditions that characterize the Witt relation $[\mathcal{C}]=[\mathcal{E}]$. Then we show the Witt group $\mathcal{W}(\mathcal{E})$ is naturally a direct sum of Witt group $\mathcal{W}:=\mathcal{W}(\text{Vec})$ and the group $\text{H}^4(G,\mathbb{K}^\times)$. Consequently, for any non-degenerate fusion category $\mathcal{C}$ over $\mathcal{E}$, there is a positive integer $n$ (e.g. $n=|G|$) such that $\mathcal{C}^{\boxtimes_\mathcal{E}^n}$ admits a minimal extension.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了Tannakian融合范畴上的Witt群结构，给出了范畴在Witt等价关系下的充要条件，并证明了相关Witt群可以分解为Vec范畴的Witt群和群上同调群的直和。
AI.motivation: 研究Tannakian融合范畴上的Witt等价关系，旨在理解在给定Tannakian范畴上非退化融合范畴的Witt群结构，特别是这些范畴如何与Vec范畴的Witt群和群上同调群相关联。
AI.method: 设ℰ=Rep(G)为Tannakian融合范畴，对于ℰ上的辫子融合范畴𝒞，给出刻画Witt关系[𝒞]=[ℰ]的充要条件。通过范畴论和代数方法分析范畴结构，特别是利用ℰ上的张量积和Witt等价关系。
AI.result: 证明了Witt群𝒲(ℰ)自然同构于𝒲(Vec)和H⁴(G,𝕂^×)的直和。对于ℰ上的任何非退化融合范畴𝒞，存在正整数n（如n=|G|）使得𝒞的n次ℰ-张量积𝒞^{⊠ℰ^n}允许极小扩张。
AI.conclusion: 本文建立了Tannakian融合范畴上Witt群的完整结构理论，揭示了其与Vec范畴Witt群和群上同调群的直接联系，为理解融合范畴的Witt等价关系提供了重要理论框架。

title: A Well-Defined Jellyfish Algorithm for the Affine $E_7$ Subfactor Planar Algebra
summary: In this paper, we contribute to the Kuperberg program by giving a diagrammatic presentation of generators and relations for the affine $E_7$ unshaded subfactor planar algebra. Using this presentation, we prove that its jellyfish algorithm is a well-defined surjection onto $\mathbb{C}$. In particular, this shows that the jellyfish algorithm is an invariant on closed diagrams for this planar algebra.

AI.tldr: 该论文为仿射E7无阴影子因子平面代数提供了图解表示，并证明了其水母算法是定义良好的满射到复数域，从而成为该平面代数闭图的拓扑不变量。
AI.motivation: 作为Kuperberg计划的一部分，研究仿射E7无阴影子因子平面代数的结构性质，特别是其水母算法的数学特性。
AI.method: 为仿射E7无阴影子因子平面代数构建图解表示（生成元和关系），并在此基础上证明水母算法是定义良好的满射到复数域。
AI.result: 成功建立了仿射E7无阴影子因子平面代数的图解表示，证明了水母算法是定义良好的满射到复数域，从而成为闭图的拓扑不变量。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为仿射E7无阴影子因子平面代数提供了完整的图解表示，并证明了其水母算法的数学性质，这对理解该平面代数的结构具有重要意义。

title: Kazhdan-Lusztig Correspondence for Vertex Operator Superalgebras from Abelian Gauge Theories
comment: This is the final version accepted by Journal of London Mathematical Society. Major updates are: corrected the use of Deligne tensor product of supercategories; added assumption 6 in Section 6.1; added Proposition 6.17. We thank the anonymous referees for very helpful comments!
summary:
We prove the Kazhdan-Lusztig correspondence for a class of vertex operator superalgebras which, via the work of Costello-Gaiotto, arise as boundary VOAs of topological B twist of 3d $\mathcal{N}=4$ abelian gauge theories. This means that we show equivalences of braided tensor categories of modules of certain affine vertex superalgebras and corresponding quantum supergroups.
  We build on the work of Creutzig-Lentner-Rupert to this large class of VOAs and extend it since in our case the categories don't have projective objectives and objects can have arbitrary Jordan Hölder length.
  Our correspondence significantly improves the understanding of the braided tensor category of line defects associated to this class of TQFT, by realizing line defects as modules of a Hopf algebra. In the process, we prove a case of the conjecture of Semikhatov-Tipunin, relating logarithmic CFTs to Nichols algebras of screening operators.

AI.tldr: 证明了Kazhdan-Lusztig对应关系适用于一类顶点算子超代数，这些代数通过Costello-Gaiotto工作作为3维N=4阿贝尔规范理论拓扑B扭曲的边界VOA出现，建立了仿射顶点超代数模块与对应量子超群模块的辫子张量范畴等价。
AI.motivation: 通过Costello-Gaiotto工作，理解3维N=4阿贝尔规范理论拓扑B扭曲的边界顶点算子超代数，并建立其模块范畴与量子超群模块范畴的对应关系，从而更好地理解这类拓扑量子场论中与线缺陷相关的辫子张量范畴。
AI.method: 基于Creutzig-Lentner-Rupert的工作，扩展到更广泛的VOA类别，处理没有投射对象且对象具有任意Jordan-Hölder长度的范畴，证明仿射顶点超代数模块与量子超群模块的辫子张量范畴等价。
AI.result: 成功证明了Kazhdan-Lusztig对应关系适用于这类顶点算子超代数，建立了仿射顶点超代数模块与对应量子超群模块的辫子张量范畴等价，将线缺陷实现为Hopf代数模块，并证明了Semikhatov-Tipunin猜想的一个特例。
AI.conclusion: 该对应关系显著提升了对这类拓扑量子场论中线缺陷辫子张量范畴的理解，通过将线缺陷实现为Hopf代数模块，建立了对数共形场论与筛选算子Nichols代数之间的联系，验证了相关猜想。

title: Line Operators in $U(1|1)$ Chern-Simons Theory
comment: The accepted version for Communications in Mathematical Physics. Corrected an error related to the associator of $\mathcal{A}$. We thank the anonymous referees for very helpful comments!
summary: We analyze the non-semisimple category of line operators in Chern-Simons gauge theories based off the Lie superalgebra $\mathfrak{gl}(1|1)$. Our proposal is that the category of line operators $\mathcal{C}$ can be identified with the derived category of modules for a boundary vertex operator algebra $\mathcal{V}$ realized as a certain infinite-order simple current extension of the affine current algebra $V(\mathfrak{gl}(1|1))$ by boundary monopole operators. By translating this simple current extension of $V(\mathfrak{gl}(1|1))$ to the unrolled, restricted quantum group $\overline{U}^E(\fgl(1|1))$, we show that our category of line operators admits a second description in terms of a quasi-quantum group $\mathcal{A}$ realized by uprolling. We also compare our results across an expected physical duality with the cyclic orbifold of a free, $B$-twisted hypermultiplet and find a slight discrepancy at the level of braiding and associator. We end with a detailed analysis of coupling to background flat $GL(1, \C)$ connections and the resulting category of non-genuine line operators.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了基于李超代数𝔤𝔩(1|1)的Chern-Simons规范理论中非半单线算子范畴，提出了两种描述方式：通过边界顶点算子代数的导出范畴，以及通过上卷构造的拟量子群。
AI.motivation: 研究𝔤𝔩(1|1) Chern-Simons理论中线算子的范畴结构，特别是非半单性质，并探索其与量子群和物理对偶性的联系。
AI.method:
1. 将线算子范畴𝒞识别为边界顶点算子代数𝒱的导出范畴，其中𝒱是仿射流代数V(𝔤𝔩(1|1))通过边界单极算子的无限阶简单电流扩展
2. 将该简单电流扩展转换到未卷缩的限制量子群Ūᴱ(𝔤𝔩(1|1))，得到拟量子群𝒜的上卷构造描述
3. 与自由B-扭曲超多重态的循环轨道折叠理论进行物理对偶比较
4. 分析背景平坦GL(1,ℂ)连接的耦合及其产生的非真线算子范畴
AI.result:
1. 建立了线算子范畴𝒞与边界顶点算子代数𝒱导出范畴的等价关系
2. 证明了该范畴也可以通过拟量子群𝒜的上卷构造来描述
3. 在与自由超多重态循环轨道折叠的对偶比较中，发现编织和结合子层面存在微小差异
4. 详细描述了背景平坦连接耦合下的非真线算子范畴结构
AI.conclusion: 𝔤𝔩(1|1) Chern-Simons理论中的线算子范畴具有丰富的数学结构，可以通过顶点算子代数和量子群两种框架描述，揭示了非半单范畴与物理对偶性之间的深刻联系，为理解拓扑场论中的范畴结构提供了新视角。
